p: MTC - Minimum concentration of C. verum leaf oil required to prevent the biofilm formation completely by killing Candida cells was determined using CFU assay. Fig. 4 represents the viability of forming biofilms with the presence of different concentrations of C. verum leaf oil and chlorhexidine digluconate determined by CFU assay on forming biofilms. Table V represents the minimum concentration of treatments required to prevent the biofilm formation of test strains completely.
